chinese: 他的健康受到壓力的影響。
pinyin: Tā de jiànkāng shòudào yālì de yǐngxiǎng.
spanish: Su salud se vio afectada por el estrés.
english: His health was affected by stress.

chinese: 經濟衰退受到全球事件的影響。
pinyin: Jīngjì shuāituì shòudào quánqiú shìjiàn de yǐngxiǎng.
spanish: La recesión económica se vio afectada por los eventos globales.
english: The economic recession was affected by global events.

chinese: 孩子的成長受到家庭環境的影響。
pinyin: Háizi de chéngzhǎng shòudào jiātíng huánjìng de yǐngxiǎng.
spanish: El crecimiento del niño se vio afectado por el entorno familiar.
english: The child's growth was affected by the family environment.

chinese: 公司的股價受到市場情緒的影響。
pinyin: Gōngsī de gǔjià shòudào shìchǎng qíngxù de yǐngxiǎng.
spanish: El precio de las acciones de la compañía se vio afectado por el sentimiento del mercado.
english: The company's stock price was affected by market sentiment.

chinese: 他的決定受到朋友的影響。
pinyin: Tā de juédìng shòudào péngyǒu de yǐngxiǎng.
spanish: Su decisión se vio afectada por sus amigos.
english: His decision was influenced by his friends.

chinese: 農作物的收成受到天氣的影響。
pinyin: Nóngzuòwù de shōucheng shòudào tiānqì de yǐngxiǎng.
spanish: La cosecha de los cultivos se vio afectada por el clima.
english: The crop yield was affected by the weather.

chinese: 城市的交通受到施工的影響。
pinyin: Chéngshì de jiāotōng shòudào shīgōng de yǐngxiǎng.
spanish: El tráfico de la ciudad se vio afectado por la construcción.
english: The city's traffic was affected by construction.

chinese: 他的心情受到壞消息的影響。
pinyin: Tā de xīnqíng shòudào huài xiāoxī de yǐngxiǎng.
spanish: Su estado de ánimo se vio afectado por las malas noticias.
english: His mood was affected by the bad news.

chinese: 傳統文化受到西方文化的影響。
pinyin: Chuántǒng wénhuà shòudào xīfāng wénhuà de yǐngxiǎng.
spanish: La cultura tradicional se vio afectada por la cultura occidental.
english: Traditional culture was influenced by Western culture.
